insert into manuscriptversion
ID, PROJECTID, DOCID, HASHNAME, USERID, ENDTIME, VERSION, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER,
VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.docid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hashname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id=VALUES(id),projectid = VALUES(projectid),docid = VALUES(docid),hashname = VALUES(hashname), userid = VALUES(userid),endtime = VALUES(endtime),version = VALUES(version), is_Delete = VALUES(is_Delete),create_Time = VALUES(create_Time), create_User = VALUES(create_User),update_Time = VALUES(update_Time),update_User = VALUES(update_User)
